title: Britain's Best Railways - 50 of the greatest journeys around Britain
description: The diverse scenery of Britain set some challenging problems for the railway builders of the 19th century, but has since been providing magnificent panoramas to travellers on the network. This book by the authors of Mapping the Railways (94872) explores 50 of the most spectacular routes, from the Scottish Highlands to the coast of Cornwall, and is comprehensively illustrated with photographs, maps, track diagrams and gradient profiles. First published as The Times Britain's Scenic Railways (2012).
author: Julian Holland
